name: Manual QA Engineer
description:
DREAMTEAM APPS is looking for a talented Manual QA to work on the company's mobile apps and products. We specialize in developing native apps for the App Store using modern development tools.

What you'll be doing:

  • Functional and non-functional testing of iOS applications;
  • Testing analytics, API, localization, subscriptions and purchases;
  • Analysis of logs;
  • Compiling a checklist for tasks.

Additional tasks:

  • Preparation of test cases;
  • Participation in design reviews;
  • Tasks related to support.

Your Experience

Must have:

  • At least 1 year and more experience in testing iOS applications;
  • Experience with Postman;
  • Knowledge and experience with sniffers (Fiddler, Charles, Proxyman);
  • Knowledge of iOS subscriptions. Subscription testing experience;
  • Experience with Firebase, Facebook analytics (Firebase Remote Confige, A/B testing);
  • Experience in testing client-server applications;
  • API testing experience;
  • Knowledge and experience with sniffers (Fiddler, Charles);
  • Be ready to perform tasks not related to testing: responses in the store and letters from users, assistance in analyzing analytics, compiling documentation and texts;
  • Basic understanding of Xcode (ability to run a project, install CocoaPods, run a project on a simulator);
  • Basic knowledge of Git;
  • Multitasking;
  • Good communication skills.

Nice to have:

  • Experience with automated testing of iOS applications
  • Experience writing API documentation in Postman. Writing tests for requests.
  • Experience in web application testing

Selection steps:

  1. Call with HR about 30 min;
  2. Technical interview with the team for 1 hour;
  3. We return to each other with an answer in a few days

Reward

  • High sallary - we discuss individually;
  • Paid holiday and sick leave;
  • Full time with a flexible 8-hour work schedule;
  • Flexible schedule: the team is located in different countries;
  • Fully remote work;
  • Career growth, progression, and learning development resources annual salary reviews
  • We provide the necessary equipment for work ;
  • A team of professionals with whom you can grow;
  • As many free subscriptions in our apps as you'd like;
  • Make changes to the implementation of the product - the company is open to new ideas
  • Lack of bureaucracy & long processes.
  • We are for a calm and friendly atmosphere with strong qualification team, a minimum of calls and strive for maximum transparency in all the processes.
